perk.name: Chambered Compensator
perk.desc: Stable barrel attachment. • Increases stability • Moderately controls recoil • Slightly decreases handling speed

perk.name: Smallbore
perk.desc: Dual strength barrel. • Increases range • Increases stability

perk.name: Polygonal Rifling
perk.desc: Barrel optimized for recoil reduction. • Increases stability

perk.name: Fluted Barrel
perk.desc: Ultra-light barrel. • Greatly increases handling speed • Slightly increases stability

perk.name: Corkscrew Rifling
perk.desc: Balanced barrel. • Slightly increases range and stability • Slightly increases handling speed

perk.name: Full Bore
perk.desc: Barrel optimized for distance. • Greatly increases range • Decreases stability • Slightly decreases handling speed

perk.name: Arrowhead Brake
perk.desc: Lightly vented barrel. • Greatly controls recoil • Increases handling speed

perk.name: Extended Barrel
perk.desc: Weighty barrel extension. • Increases range • Decreases handling speed • Moderately controls recoil

perk.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling
perk.desc: Durable ranged barrel. • Increases range

perk.name: Full Choke
perk.desc: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.

perk.name: Rifled Barrel
perk.desc: Ranged shotgun barrel. • Increases range • Greatly decreases handling speed

perk.name: Smoothbore
perk.desc: Smooth shotgun barrel. Greatly increases range at the cost of more projectile spread.

perk.name: Barrel Shroud
perk.desc: Balanced shotgun barrel. • Increases stability • Increases handling speed

perk.name: Volatile Launch
perk.desc: This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload. • Greatly increases blast radius • Slightly decreases handling speed • Slightly decreases projectile speed

perk.name: Confined Launch
perk.desc: This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable. • Greatly increases stability • Increases blast radius • Decreases projectile speed

perk.name: Linear Compensator
perk.desc: This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced. • Slightly increases projectile speed • Slightly increases blast radius • Slightly increases stability

perk.name: Hard Launch
perk.desc: This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed. • Greatly increases projectile speed • Decreases stability • Slightly decreases blast radius

perk.name: Quick Launch
perk.desc: This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming. • Greatly increases handling speed • Increases projectile speed

perk.name: Smart Drift Control
perk.desc: This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control. • Moderately controls recoil • Increases stability • Increases handling speed • Slightly increases projectile speed

perk.name: Countermass
perk.desc: This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil. • Greatly controls recoil • Increases stability • Increases handling speed

perk.name: Polymer String
perk.desc: Unbreakable bowstring. • Slightly increases accuracy • Slightly faster draw time

perk.name: Tactile String
perk.desc: Stable, high-friction bowstring. • Slightly increases accuracy • Increases stability

perk.name: Natural String
perk.desc: Simple balanced string. • Slightly increases accuracy • Slightly increases handling speed • Slightly increases stability

perk.name: Elastic String
perk.desc: Excellent snapback. • Decreases accuracy • Faster draw time • Slightly increases handling speed

perk.name: High Tension String
perk.desc: Tightly strung bow. • Greatly increases accuracy • Slightly slower draw time • Slightly decreases stability

perk.name: Agile Bowstring
perk.desc: Durable yet light bowstring. • Greatly increases handling speed • Slightly increases stability

perk.name: Flexible String
perk.desc: Light and easy to draw. • Slightly faster draw time • Slightly decreases accuracy • Increases handling speed
